title: The Truly exceptional Dan Haley
creator_credit: John Cosgrove, James Thompson, Dave Bell Associates and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
brief_description: A 16 year old who has lost 80% of his vision and will eventually be completely blind, Dan Haley does not think of himself as a handicapped person, and leads an active life. His biggest problem is that people try to do too much for him.
creator_credit_for_label: John Cosgrove, James Thompson, Dave Bell Associates and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
